name: Rite of Passage: The Perfect Show Collector's Edition
description: After your student goes missing alongside several other children, it is up to you to solve the mystery of Everlake.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 586 MB available space
